title: I can't switch to the Beta client
body: Ive recently got the urge to upgrade to the beta client, but the option isn't there anymore when I launch the game. Help?

replies.body:
If you haven't upgraded to the Beta Client, you should have a tile to upgrade within your Legacy Patcher, as shown in the screenshot below:

https://imgur.com/a/GbgFI

Let me know if this helped!
The beta client is the default client. You would switch to the legacy client, not beta.
